mapper.insert: insert into baby_member.t_alabao_turn_out ( transfer_money, member_id, card_holder, update_id, bank_name, id, update_time, turn_out_status, card_no, account, create_time ) values ( #{transferMoney}, #{memberId}, #{cardHolder}, #{updateId}, #{bankName}, #{id}, #{updateTime}, #{turnOutStatus}, #{cardNo}, #{account}, now() )
mapper.update: update baby_member.t_alabao_turn_out set turn_out_status=#{turnOutStatus} where id = #{id}

update baby_member.t_alabao_turn_out set
transfer_money=#{transferMoney},
card_holder=#{cardHolder},
update_id=#{updateId},
bank_name=#{bankName},
turn_out_status=#{turnOutStatus},
card_no=#{cardNo},
account=#{account},
update_time=now()
id = #{id}
